website_summaries.verdict: The IDS folding city bike is for commuters who want to park and ride to work or the beach. The 6-gear system limits the top speed, but it is best suited for short distances anyway.
pros: Easy to fold and easy to customize
Lightweight frame is easy to carry
cons: Pedals do not fold with frame
Gear ratios limit speed to 15 mph
Many adjustments needed before first ride

customer_reviews.title: Love this bike right out of the box!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first folding bicycle and I absolutely love it!! Came fully assembled out of the box just had to pump up the tires. I love this bike and can highly recommend it to anyone. My wife who is 5'2" rides it as well as myself at 5'7" with no issues. It has a quick adjusting handle bars and seat. I've taken it on the road and it works well for medium distance but I mainly use it for running my pooch and zipping around camp sights as we RV full time. Looks stylish as well and the seat is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: jdbenade

customer_reviews.title: Solid bike, enough for others to want it too.
customer_reviews.text: Was a pretty good bike for being able to fit in your trunk, tires seemed to need to be filled a little more than usual for a bike but if it's already in your trunk it is easy to just have a bike pump in your trunk too. Was good enough that someone else thought the just needed to have it too after I'd had it a month, and promptly stole it right off the bike rack I had it locked up on outside the building I was in. Other than that it was a very solid bike, didn't feel flimsy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: So far very pleased. I'm a bike fanatic and mechanic and I bought this on a whim not really expecting that much. But, build quality seems excellent and it makes a perfect travel bike or basic transportation for just hopping around town. The included rack is a great touch. My only minor complaint is that seat clamp required a pair of pliers to get thumb screw tight enough to hold seat stem firmly. Other than this, assembly was easy.
customer_reviews.author: ims

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I have been very happy with this bike. My only complaint would be the packing materials used for shipping. They used styrofoam which broke apart and left tiny styrofoam balls everywhere. They were stuck in the chain, gears, brakes, etc. I still find them, months later. Aside from that, the bike is great. Well worth the price. It folds up easily and can fit in my trunk. I use it mainly for camping. I wouldn't want to ride it for very long distances, but it works well for trips around the campground. I love the included rack and use it frequently. It was easy to put together..
customer_reviews.author: MichiganFan

customer_reviews.title: Please consider making bike part of your life
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter for daily ride to work. She's able to fold and put together with ease after initial learning curve. Check out the YouTube video on breakdown/buildup of bike.
customer_reviews.author: SCO FLEM

customer_reviews.title: I was using it when this happened and hurt myself pretty bad. This was my first purchase ever for ...
customer_reviews.text: I received the wrong bike, got a black and green one that was completely different. On top of that, it was defected. The handle bars came completely off of the frame, from the very inside. I was using it when this happened and hurt myself pretty bad. This was my first purchase ever for a folding bike and my last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bike!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter who's in college. Had a minor glitz that was immediately taken care by the seller! Perfect bike!
customer_reviews.author: Donna M.

customer_reviews.title: Can’t foldable bike
customer_reviews.text: When I received it, I found the seat can’t fix in good condition, Second, the joint can’t fasten Third, the handle can’t fasten. And when I try to ride it, the handhold always turn left! It’s very dangerous! So I contact seller, after 2 days, I got an email from seller, they let me return it to amazon, the most important thing happened, when I want to foldable into it’s original box, I found it can’t foldable, this is a “foldable “ bike!but can’t foldable now!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Would be a 5-star if it would've had A dual metal chain guards instead of a flimsy plastic set that snapped after just a few times of setting it in front of my passenger seat. As for the rear of the bike, is great, I love it. I wish the cables didn't get in the way when folding and unfolding sometimes, but that's not uncommon with geared folding bikes.
customer_reviews.author: The Einkorns

customer_reviews.title: Nice except for a serious flaw
customer_reviews.text: It's well made and hinged parts have safety latches, so if a part unexpectedly folds, it's because you didn't have it latched correctly. But a serious problem is that the derailleur was not set correctly at the factory. Because of this, the chain went past 1st gear an into the spokes, because the plastic spoke guard is not up agains the 1st gear, like it should be, to prevent that. However, that's not usually a hard problem to fix except that these gears are not solid plates of steel. Rather, they are spoked, which lets the chain get stuck in its gaps. I had to remove the derailleur to free the chain.
customer_reviews.author: dky

customer_reviews.title: So-o Heavy
customer_reviews.text: So--o heavy. I put my Trek Classic cruiser in and out of my Subaru Forester no problem. This foldable--no way! I read all the questions and answers, and several reviews, which said this bike was " very light" "around 30 pounds". Huh?? Should have read "Product Info" which states " Item weight 42pounds. " I managed to get this out of the box and knew it was way too heavy. Needed help to get it back in the box right away and to U PS for return. I wonder if this is the same bike as the one in the reviews. Latest one is April 2018. And Cost cited was $175. I paid $285.81!! What a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: J. M.

customer_reviews.title: Comes mostly assembled. Very sturdy . It’s bigger than I thought.
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed. Well packaged easy to assemble. Delivered on time. I’ve been looking at purchasing a folding bike for quite a while. This one was a little more then the other one I was looking at. But by the time you pay someone to assemble it . It come out a little cheaper. The only assembling required is the seat, handle bars,peddles, the cute bell and he front reflector. Had it done in 10 minutes. This is a very sturdy bike and easy to ride.
customer_reviews.author: Laura D Devito

customer_reviews.title: I love this bike!
customer_reviews.text: I had a horrible bike before and I was reluctant to buy any bike. My previous bike was a nightmare and it took me years to invest in a new bike. This bike was the best investment I made! I am using it at least once a week since I got it. It is not light since it weight is about 30 pounds, but I got used to it and it is pretty handy. It folds nicely. I don't understand why other people posted complains, I assume they need help in putting it together. Bike has safety adjustments that prevent from accidents.
customer_reviews.author: ankakaro

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bike - Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Must say this bike is well made and sturdy. Very easy to assemble. Just need a crescent wrench and Phillip’s head screw driver. I bought an XSPEC bike as well for the same price ~$200.00. The XSPEC is sharp looking but does not appear to be as well made as the UNYOUSUAL bike. The XSPEC bike took 1-1/2 hrs to assemble while the UNYOUSUAL took 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handlebars and stem wobble too much
customer_reviews.text: I took this bike to Australia. What I like about this folding bike is that it rides very well and the brakes are good. It is also very sturdy and the quality for the money is good. The only problem I am currently having is that the handlebars and stem below the handlebars wobble too much even though I have made adjustments to the screw where the front stem clamps and un-clamps below the handle bars and just above the front fender. I would appreciate any advice on how to fix this nagging issue and would then increase the online review to four stars.
customer_reviews.author: ANDREW J POWELL

customer_reviews.title: Great for commuting or sight seeing
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bike. There’s not much assembling that needs to happen. You can definitely do it with some household tools. I just took it to a local bike shop to have the brakes adjusted and had them put some air in my tires. It’s only a six speed bike with small tires so it doesn’t go very fast but it’s still a great commuter bike which is what it was intended for. It comes with a bike Bell which is cool. Very easy to fold up and store in your trunk. A good but most definitely.
customer_reviews.author: Markel Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Overall satisfied but with some issues
customer_reviews.text: Fairly affordable for what it is but I was a bit irritated that the instructions state the brakes were quality checked from the factory but this just isn't the case. The fronts are fine but the rears are spongy and prone to wobble. Overall I'm satisfied with the purchase but wish the brake issue was quality checked better from the start.
customer_reviews.author: A. Chung

customer_reviews.title: Good bike. Use it daily at work
customer_reviews.text: Good bike. Use it daily at work. Convenient to store and secure in small spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Rocco Valicento

customer_reviews.title: GET THIS ONE
customer_reviews.text: After having it inspected by a bike shop I went on my first ride and I was pleasantly surprised! This is a great purchase! The photos don't capture how sturdy this bike really is. The handle bar and seat where easy to adjust to fit my height of 5'7". Its light weight and fits in the trunk of my small mini cooper just fine. I suggest investing in a small bungee cord to hold it together when folded to make carrying it easier. If your looking for an inexpensive, extremely sturdy, easy folding, stylish folding bike GET THIS ONE!
customer_reviews.author: T. Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievably high quality ! Recommend this to anyone !
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I bought already. I believe this unyousual brand is really offering very outstanding high quality bike. Easy to ride, easy to fold and put away as well. One of my friends weighted over 200+ pounds can ride on this folding bike. They also ship the it in a good package box, so of course, the bike inside is perfectly good when it arrived. It only took me about 5 mins to install. On top of all that, you don't see this price for a folding bike anywhere now.
customer_reviews.author: John Sanders

customer_reviews.title: love, love, love this bike
customer_reviews.text: Easy to ride, very stable, shifting gears flawless Every time I go out, people pull me over to ask about it,
customer_reviews.author: Becky Sunner

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe
customer_reviews.text: The handle bar mechanism was either missing a part or doesn't lock correctly. My wife scraped herself up on her birthday.
customer_reviews.author: William Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.text: We are happy with this purchase! Easy to assemble and it runs well! Easy to adjust. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Svetlana

customer_reviews.title: Very useful and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This bike is great, my husband uses it to get to work, cuz parking lots are very expensive in downtown, so he parks for free someplace near downtown gets the bike out of his trunk and bikes the rest of the way to work. Very useful and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: sofy

customer_reviews.text: I liked the quality of the bike, but it was a bit wobbly when I first rode the bike. So I would recommend going to a bike shop to fit your bike properly. But, what I didn't like about this bike is that it weight 34lbs, which is a lot for me. So, I am planning on returning this bike.
customer_reviews.author: Cosmos

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: Came 99% assembled. Everything was adjusted, the brakes and gears all worked smoothly with no fiddling. Stable on the road.
customer_reviews.author: N. G. Varras

customer_reviews.title: Quality of product.
customer_reviews.text: I like weight size and material, but no instruction how to maintain, so last one was a little tricky for my girl friend.
customer_reviews.author: Kirill A. Krylov

customer_reviews.title: kind of heavy
customer_reviews.text: if I knew how heavy the bike is ,I would spend more for lighter one ,and another issue is that gears and low ,probably made for bigger wheels like 26 and in this 20 " I kind of wish for 2 higher gears to go faster .
customer_reviews.author: DARIUSZ GADEK

customer_reviews.title: Stay away! A horrible bike!
customer_reviews.text: The bike is very flimsy. Low quality parts, horrible brakes. Everything keeps braking! It is not aluminum alloy, so it will rust and it is heavy. I ordered mine on 13th of may 2019, so it's been only 10 months and it didn't hold up at all. I would never recommend this bike to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Kuvatbek D.

customer_reviews.title: Defected handle bar grip
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was super quick. While I was assembling the bike, I noticed the handle bar grip was broken. I haven't finished assembling yet, but will see what other defects I come across...
customer_reviews.author: DazedDaisy

customer_reviews.title: Great value! Bike seems sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this bike, it seems a higher quality than I expected for the price. Liked it so much I'm buying another one!
customer_reviews.author: J and T

customer_reviews.title: My new bike
customer_reviews.text: I bought this about a week ago. I am really pleased with bike. It is very adjustable. The bike does ride real well. I had a problem with a missing latch. I emailed my problem. A customer service tech (Sara) assisted in getting the part.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Remillard

customer_reviews.title: It’s heavy to handle
customer_reviews.text: The only problem is that the bike is kinda heavy, and not very confortable to handle when is in its compact shape!
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Oliveros

customer_reviews.title: Imbalance problem
customer_reviews.text: It is an okay product. The only complain is its wheel and handle bar don’t cross right. It seems they are made imbalanced from the factory. My shoulder has to put different power on right and left handle bar each to make a balance..
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Folding Bike
customer_reviews.text: Limited experience, however it works great, and looks good. easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Hans

customer_reviews.title: Good Bike all in all except for one thing
customer_reviews.text: The Bike is Good Overall, my only issue is that the bike seat is just not comfortable. after a long bike ride it just hurts when i stand up. but besides that everything else in the bike is good
customer_reviews.author: Sean MB

customer_reviews.title: Great bike
customer_reviews.text: Great bike, I'm 5ft 2in I'm able to adjust seat to as low as I can the only thing I'd say would need improvement is the seat cushion. I'm not very strong so it's only difficult to fold and unfold the handle bar. Other than that it's easy to fold and unfold.
customer_reviews.author: DonnaJean Inman

customer_reviews.title: Great little bike
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little bike for someone who wants to casually ride. Perfect size for me I’m 5’3”. Easy to put together and easy to transport but can give me problem sometimes when trying to fold up. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Xnjgirl

customer_reviews.title: Weight
customer_reviews.text: Bike beautiful ,but to heavy to transport back in and out for a women with sight handicap using a van or car. Will return and try o get lighter weight.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike!
customer_reviews.text: Great bike! It's very easy to assemble and fun to ride. Nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa J. Flores

customer_reviews.title: It seems like a very well-made bike
customer_reviews.text: I like the ride on this bike. It is very smooth and the bike is very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: R. Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: I've been riding this about 10 miles per week for the last few months and it's holding up great. Nice build quality. I thought I'd feel weird riding it around, but despite its looks, it feels just like a normal bike while you're riding it. Being able to fold it up and fit it into the trunk of my car is fantastic and is just as easy as I hoped it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Tam Pham

customer_reviews.title: Only drawbacks was the manual was useless, the font was way to small and did ...
customer_reviews.text: After of a week of having this bike i have come the conclusion the bike is Have went on 2 rides 2 thumbs ups. Is everything that i was looking for. Only drawbacks was the manual was useless , the font was way to small and did not seem to match the bike and it took some doing to attach the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Sherice Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I like this bike - it’s great quality and comfortable to ride.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bike for the cost
customer_reviews.text: I have had this bike on several rides and it rides smooth and gears change very well. Its made for touring locally and long distance riding. The six speed is great for touring around. No problems with this bike so far.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous to ride! Don't chance it!
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made, both tires flat, handlebars will not go together properly, broken screws, very dangerous thing to ride around on!
customer_reviews.author: C. O'Neil

customer_reviews.title: It fits easily into the car in the morning and it's a ...
customer_reviews.text: It fits easily into the car in the morning and it's a great ride to bike home in the evening. It's easy to fold/unfold and it surely doesn't feel like it's over 40lbs when I carry it into my office. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Good bike
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good bike. I keep it in my small airplane, and use it to ride a few miles from the airport where i land. I would recommend this to anyone. The smaller wheels mean you cant win a bike race, but that should not be any issue.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Nice solid foldable bike
customer_reviews.text: Feels really solid. Seat support does not slide down in mine. Nice road tires. Gears work quite well. Happy with gear range. Very nice appearance. The fenders and bike rack are great extras. Easy to assemble after disposal of packing materials.
customer_reviews.author: G Brash

customer_reviews.title: It works grate thank you
customer_reviews.text: comes almost full assembled only thing you place together is the peddles and seat easy to place togeather other than that . it came fast too
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Broke in the first day in less than 7 miles
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for 1 day and the back tire broke. I filled it up the exact psi recommended and the back tire already broke. It worked great for about 7 miles. Do not buy this if you plan on actually using it as a bike and by bike I mean riding it on flat roads from point A to B.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Grunseich

customer_reviews.title: Misaligned wheels
customer_reviews.text: When I received the bike, both wheels were misaligned. Riding it was very tedious because it was always rubbing one of the brakes, I tried to straighten things out, but they never were true. Sent back next day.
customer_reviews.author: Siegfried O'Crates

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money!! It's a little heavy but nothing crazy its a perfect bike that can fit in a closet without losing too much space. Get it!!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not for adults
customer_reviews.text: not for adults. I returned this item back to the seller right after when i recevied the item. - Heavy (like BMX model bikes ) 80's 90's cruise style - not useful - not stable
customer_reviews.author: ibrahim

customer_reviews.title: Shoddy
customer_reviews.text: Would not purchase these again. Seat keeps slipping down when riding no matter how tight we make it.
customer_reviews.author: Booker

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bike.
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome bike. Perfect for almost any size and I am 5'11". The left pedal wasn't screwing in so I had to ask the seller for a new pair.
customer_reviews.author: Muid

customer_reviews.title: I liked it !
customer_reviews.text: If u have no space for storage this is a perfect bike. Great prize and great value for your money !
customer_reviews.author: Julienne Munyabarenzi

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and unstable
customer_reviews.text: Both tires went out immediately then the whole bike is falling into pieces.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Easy folding bike
customer_reviews.text: I like the bike ,easy to fold and set up, and it’s very easy to go biking with my daughter, and the seat is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Hongyingfang

customer_reviews.title: Great ride
customer_reviews.text: I must say it’s a very comfortable ride! Upgrade to a larger softer seat and you are all set! I purchased this bike along with a more expensive version. This bike is all that you need and looks very cool
customer_reviews.author: Edible Arrangements

customer_reviews.title: Holding up the strong
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sturdy frame I've been riding it a couple of day it's holding and I'm no light weight
customer_reviews.author: James  Gaether

customer_reviews.title: Great little bike
customer_reviews.text: Had to straighten wheels after shipping but rides great!!! Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Payne

customer_reviews.title: Service is good
customer_reviews.text: Product is good. Not perfect but good for this price. Service is good. Quickly resolved a problem with a damaged part.
customer_reviews.author: Cheng S.

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: The frame seems nice, but I can't ride it yet because all the parts are missing. Please send me the necessary parts soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband and he loves it...very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly a

customer_reviews.title: I am a light person130 lbs this is not for big people
customer_reviews.text: I use it all the time, just did 7 miles
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: great bike
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough about this bike. Right purchase at the right time. The price was a steal. I've already got a lot of use out it and intend to get a whole lot more.
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  Very sturdy and fun!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful little bike to take on vacation or whatever. Did not take very long to assemble. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: The folding/unfolding process is not exactly the same as the ...
customer_reviews.text: The folding/unfolding process is not exactly the same as the linked instruction posted in youtube. I am not able to folding it back, the bike is a folding bike to me anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Li Ding

customer_reviews.title: Very Good but the bicycle rear tire was damage also the ...
customer_reviews.text: Very Good but the bicycle rear tire was damage also the rear brake damage It cost me a lot for repair
customer_reviews.author: Ibrahim A. Khawaher

customer_reviews.title: I got it nexday promised.
customer_reviews.text: I didnot get the color adverticed. I got different color.
customer_reviews.author: JOSE ROSALES

customer_reviews.title: Missing a part
customer_reviews.text: Not a good design. I believe there is a part missing. I have requested to return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like this bike
customer_reviews.text: I like this bike. It folds easily, but I have to use a bungee cord to keep it tight when folded. I also notice that I could use more gears, as about 15 mph I can't peddle any faster. I use this to ride 5 miles to catch a train into DC and then once off the train, ride 2 miles to work. For the price, it is great. But If you need to move things along, I would look at a bike with more gears. I am happy with the product. 3 1/2 stars
customer_reviews.author: J. Mark Christensen

customer_reviews.title: very nice and easy to right
customer_reviews.text: very nice and easy to right , it fold good but you just to watch out you have to hold it , sometimes it separate and hard to handle..
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Mascardo

customer_reviews.title: Tall order
customer_reviews.text: Being 6' tall, I was a bit worried it wouldn't be a comfortable ride. Had it for a week and it's wonderful! I took it out of the box and three minor adjustments (aligning the front fork and tightening a couple of bolts) later I was riding the streets of SoCal. Love this thing. And it's quite the conversation starter. People are interesting in the way it folds and kids just think it looks cool.
customer_reviews.author: John Phelan

customer_reviews.title: Plus the manual is useless -. -
customer_reviews.text: The bike is okay . The only thing holding me back on giving it 5 is the folding part . The middle folding is hard to put into place and lock . Can't pull the hinge to lock with ease . Plus the manual is useless -.-
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!😃 MIND TOTALLY BLOWN
customer_reviews.text: Greatest bike ever well designed and came 98% put together with air in the tires how great is that. Only had to install the pedals which took a couple of min. If your thinking about doing it go for it trust me just as good as $400 Dahon bike. For alot cheaper price.
customer_reviews.author: antonio

customer_reviews.title: The bike seems good quality otherwise
customer_reviews.text: The folding mechanism is hard to operate. The bike seems good quality otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Jonas B.

customer_reviews.title: ... take out the bike unwrapped it I do not like how hard it is to fold and unfold the ...
customer_reviews.text: Hi i recently purchased this bike and just received it yesterday i open the box take out the bike unwrapped it I do not like how hard it is to fold and unfold the bike 2nd i go to put the pedals on only one go's on the other one the crank where you screw the pedal to the hole is is chamfer too much so the threads won't catch
customer_reviews.author: chirstopher r.

customer_reviews.title: Folding on frame
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about the fold Point on frame. It doesn't latch. Maybe I'm missing a part?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best value & great bike!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love ...love this bike! It’s so comfortable, fun and a joy to ride. It isn’t the lightest folding bike, but it is the best bang for my money & the best value.....I did change to a larger gel seat & Added a chain(derailleur) guard. I had my local bike store check all & tighten everything & they agreed it’s a great bike!
customer_reviews.author: D.M.

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bike to fold up can take along with you in your car or whatever.
customer_reviews.author: Joe in AlasKa

product_meta.title: unYOUsual U Transformer 20" Folding City Bike Bicycle 6 Speed Shimano Gear Steel Frame Mudguard Rear Carrier Front Rear Wheel Reflectors Silver
feature_bullets: 20 - inch folding bicycle designed for commuting and exercising.
Shimano 6 speed shifter and derailleur. semi-alloy front and rear V-brake.
Quick removable front handle stem. with alloy silver color cap & PVC black bell.
